thread.title: Slap Stuff Together
thread.title_full: MOO.COM reviewed by Slap Stuff Together

author: Slap Stuff Together
title: Slap Stuff Together
text: I've ordered my business cards from several different suppliers. You know the ones offering a steap discount on the quantity of your purchase. When you get them, they are nice, but they are not a conversation starter. With Moo, that's completely different. If there is an issue with your artwork, they work through it with you. Once you get your product, the stock and registration of the print are pristine. People get excited when I hand them our little square business card and they immediately want to know more about my company and who we went to for our cards.
